summary: The video features a person dressed in a steampunk-inspired outfit, standing against a dark background. The outfit includes a top hat, goggles, and intricate mechanical details, reflecting the steampunk aesthetic. The person appears to be posing confidently, showcasing the costume. The audio plays a portion of the song 'Riders on the Storm' by The Doors, which adds a moody and atmospheric tone to the video. The text overlay indicates that this is part of a steampunk convention, suggesting a focus on the subculture and its fashion elements.
keywords: steampunk, convention, costume, top hat, goggles, mechanical details, Riders on the Storm, The Doors, fashion, subculture
